name: Tinted With You
overview: In Korea’s feudal past, the deposed Crown Prince Lee Heon has been forced into a lonely exile by his cruel older brother, who has usurped the throne. Lee Heon fears for his life at every moment, as his brother plans to secure his place on the royal seat by killing him. Assassins and other schemes are a constant threat for Lee Heon, whose only true ally is his faithful and kind-hearted bodyguard Geum. Meanwhile, in modern times, a high school student named Eun Ho loves paintings. In fact, art is his whole world. And when he is tasked with completing a mysterious painting, he is unexpectedly drawn back into the distant past, where he meets Lee Heon. The duo starts to form a close, romantic, and tender bond. But as the acting king grows restless, hoping to kill the exiled Crown Prince as soon as possible, Eun Ho begins to understand that he may be Lee Heon’s best – or perhaps only – chance of survival...

episodes.name: Foreigner
episodes.overview: High school student Eun Ho is transported to feudal Korea through a mysterious painting. There, he immediately encounters Lee Heon, an exiled prince.

episodes.name: Mission
episodes.overview: Lee Heon promises Eun Ho his freedom in exchange for delivering a letter to the king.

episodes.name: Message from the Painting
episodes.overview: Eun Ho sets out on his own to deliver the letter on behalf of the prince.

episodes.name: Concentric
episodes.overview: An attempt on the prince's life forces the trio closer together.

episodes.name: Harmony
episodes.overview: Euon Ho takes Lee Heon to paint the sunset, but Geum starts to worry when they stay out too late.

episodes.name: Posthumous
episodes.overview: Eon Ho desperately searches for a way home as his final exam is less than a week away.

episodes.name: Conquer
episodes.overview: With knowledge that the king will soon order Lee Heon to take poison, Eun Ho hurries to finish the painting with hopes of escaping with Lee Heon.
